attributes.action: Request Jasbir to FIND his lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jasbir has lost his lines, Please ask him to FIND THEM!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
